Neat facts about micro black holes
POWER: They embody the most efficient way possible to store energy and to produce power from a given mass
SPACE: They are by far the most efficient and effective way possible to propel a spacecraft - even to the stars
BIG SHIPS: Because of their weight, spacecraft payload mass considerations are moot by comparison
ETERNAL: They can be eternally reused by recharging them with any sort of mass or energy
PUNCHY: They are incredibly small and incredibly heavy and produce incredible power levels
LOCALISED: They self-contain themselves, unlike antimatter
GREEN: They dispose of themselves automatically, producing no enduring waste
LABORATORY: At end of life, they are likely to display new physics

We know...We know...We know. No you don't. Black holes are not holes. They are not part of a worm hole. Worm holes are pure theory. There is no corroboration for worm holes other than more theories. 'Black holes' are Black dense bodies. Extremely dense bodies, with gravity so strong nothing can leave, not even light. Supermassive black holes are even massive in size as well as mass. That is why they can hold all the matter in a galaxy from spinning off. Black holes are not a mystery when you stop thinking of them as holes.
